A6_ACI_FUNC.description: Set A6 up for AC current (from dormant)

A6_ACVOFFSET_CAL.description: Set A6 for ACV offset cal after dialing up output

A6_AD_NULL_SETUP.description: Setup A/D nulling; set VDAC to zero before this, and average 10 A/D readings after.

steps.description: Set A/D inputs to AIN7 vs AINCOM
Set AIN7 inputs to VDAC vs VDAC

A6_CONFIG_AD_RATE.description: Set A/D rate and have it recalibrate itself (NOTE: caller must delay 1 minute!).

A6_CONFIG_DIGITIZER.description: Configure all but the A/D rate (which adds a second for A/D self-calibration); inputs: P6DIGNUMSMPLS; P6DIGEXPECTED1; A6DDSEL2 gain bits; P6ADSEL; A6ADMUX

steps.description: Set number of samples for digitizer to average
Set the expected average for the digitizer

A6_DACRATIO1.description: Set VDAC & IDAC to the checkpoint value for DAC ratio cal

steps.description: Coarse counts near positive zero value; fine counts at 0

A6_DACRATIO2.description: Set VDAC & IDAC to the initial guess for ratio cal iteration

steps.description: Coarse counts one less than VDACRATIO1; fine counts set to default ratio

A6_DCI_FUNC.description: Set A6 up for DC current (from dormant), positive current value (negative polarity DAC)

A6_DCI_SET_POLARITY_NEGATIVE.description: Set polarity negative (assume it is positive now).

steps.description: Initial setting inst amp inputs: VDAC vs VDAC
Power on default: primary channel selects RAM waveform 0, secondary selects waveform 1
Initial setting A/D inputs: inst amp vs COMMON

A6_DUMP.description: Get A6DDSEL0, A6DDSEL1, A6DDSEL2, A6DDSRLY1, A6DDSRLY2

steps.description: SetA/D mux to IDAC to IDAC

A6_GET_DIGITIZER_STATUS.description: Get digitizer status register (same as control register)

A6_GET_DIGITIZER_VALUE_1.description: Get the only or the first digitizer average

A6_GET_DIGITIZER_VALUE_2.description: Get the second digitizer average (when two digitizers are running)

steps.description: TODO: once A6DDSACCUM is working again, change to A6DDSACCUM and remove next step

A6_GET_IDAC.description: Get IDAC DAC (IDAC) coarse and fine counts (parameters 1 & 2)

A6_GET_ISCALE_ICOMP.description: Get the scale and comp DACs (1st and 2nd parameters, respectively)

A6_GET_POLARITY.description: Read A6DDSRLY2, which includes the VDAC/IDAC polarity relays

A6_GET_PWM5.description: Set PWM5 (ACI and secondary ACV DC cancellation) DAC

A6_GET_VDAC.description: Get VDAC coarse and fine counts (parameters 1 & 2)

A6_GET_VSCALE_VCOMP.description: Get scale and comp DACs (1st and 2nd parameters, respectively)

A6_HV_STBY.description: dial down A6 output without changing any switches

A6_ISCALE_AND_IDAC_OPER.description: Operate: Set scale/comp (parameters 1 & 2) Set IDAC coarse/fine counts (parameters 3 & 4)

steps.description: a small delay to prevent overshoot

A6_ISCALE_AND_IDAC_STBY.description: Standby: (reverse order) Set scale/comp (parameters 1 & 2) Set IDAC coarse/fine counts (parameters 3 & 4)

A6_MEASURE_SETUP.description: Set A6 admux to measure voltage

A6_READ_AD.description: Take an A/D reading directly; returns one A/D reading

A6_RESET_DIGITIZER.description: Toggle the hard reset bit of the digitizer.

steps.description: Send the SDATAC command to the ADC

A6_SAMPLING_LOF.description: Set the A6 for sampling signals <= 40 Hz

A6_ACI_BELOW_40HZ.description: Set the A6 for sampling ACI <= 40 Hz

A6_ACI_ABOVE_40HZ.description: Set the A6 for normal ACI operation

A6_SET_BIPOLAR.description: With no particular niceties upfront, set VDAC/IDAC to bipolar (centered)

steps.description: Set VDAC close to zero for bipolar
Set IDAC close to zero for bipolar

A6_SYNC_ADC.description: Strobe the sync line of the ADS1256

A6_VLOOP_MON_MEAS.description: Set up the A6 to monitor the error integrator voltage

A6_VSCALE_AND_VDAC_STBY.description: Standby: (reverse order) Set scale/comp (parameters 3 & 4) Set coarse/fine counts (parameters 1 & 2)

A6_ZERO_ACI.description: Set DACs close to zero for ACI

A6_ZERO_ACV.description: Set DACs close to zero for ACV

A6_ZERO_AMPLIFIER_DISABLE.description: Reverts to prior state after changing supplies/polarity

A6_ZERO_AMPLIFIER_ENABLE.description: Provides a solid zero to the amplifier when changing supplies/polarity

A6_ZERO_DACS_QUICK.description: Set scale & comp DACs to 0, VDAC/IDAC to zero in bipolar

A6_ZERO_DCI.description: Set DACs close to zero for positive DCI

A6_ZERO_NEG_DCV.description: Set DAC close to zero for negative DCV

A6_ZERO_POS_DCV.description: Set DAC close to zero for positive DCV

A6_Z_CAL_ZERO.description: Configure A14, A5, and A6 for offset zero cal in resistance

A6_Z_FUNC.description: Set up A6 for Resistance, Capacitance, Inductance
